New Year's Eve 2015 in Cologne: The night that traumatized thousands of women and shook Germany
description: On New Year's Eve in 2015, more than 1,000 women were sexually assaulted in Cologne by groups of men, many from North Africa and the Middle East, triggering a fierce debate over Germany's refugee policy. Ten years on, victims say their trauma was politicized, as they continue to live with the consequences of that night.

French government defends George Clooney's citizenship amid language rule backlash
description: A junior interior minister criticized the naturalization of George Clooney and his family despite the actor's limited French, calling it a 'double standard,' while officials said the Clooneys met all legal requirements and contribute to France's cultural prestige.

headline: France seeks to ban social media for children under 15
description: The initiative is backed by President Emmanuel Macron, who said earlier this month that Parliament should start debating such a proposal in January.

headline: In Brazil, love vibrates at the heart of society
description: Traditions around love have long spilled beyond the realm of intimacy to shape the social, political and even collective identity of the country, writes Le Monde's correspondent Bruno Meyerfeld in his final dispatch.

headline: Trump takes the lead as the US celebrates 250 years of independence
description: Ahead of the anniversary of the 1776 Declaration of Independence, Americans are urged to celebrate the nation's history and ideals of exceptionalism, as Donald Trump moves to gain control over anniversary events alongside a nonpartisan commission created in 2016.

Europe's dramatic decline in pharmaceutical production threatens health sovereignty
description: The rise of China and India, combined with protectionist pressure from the Trump administration, is redrawing the global map of the pharmaceutical industry. The Europe-wide deindustrialization that began in the 2000s is now accelerating.

headline: Sex: Should you really 'enjoy yourself before settling down' and entering a relationship?
description: Le Monde columnist Maïa Mazaurette challenges arguments that urge young people to expand their range of sexual experiences and partners – especially maxims that undermine the value of relationships.

headline: Israel: The MAGA world's new obsession
description: As Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is expected to meet with US President Donald Trump in Miami on Monday, December 29, Israel has become a source of contention and fantasy within the Trump movement.
